Package com.polarion.platform.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ILoginPolicy
    Login policy class.
    IPermission
    The permission interface.
    ISecurityService
    The entry point for authentication and authorization tasks.
    ISecurityService.IBackendSecuritySynchronizationResult
    Result of ISecurityService.synchronizeBackendSecurity(Collection, Collection).
    IUserCredentials  
    IUserManagementPolicy
    User management policy class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdministrationPermission
    Administration permission class.
    ChangePasswordPermission
    Change password permission class.
    LoginPermission
    Login permission class.
    LoginPolicy
    ILoginPolicy implementation.
    Permission
    This is the basic IPermission implementation.
    ReportPermission
    Report permission class.
    TcssToken
    The factory used to create a Teamcenter Security Services (TCSS) token that can then be passed directly to the ISecurityService#login(String, String) method and used for token logins.
    UserManagementPermission
    User management permission class.
    UserManagementPolicy
    IUserManagementPolicy implementation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthenticationFailedException
    Thrown by the ISecurityService.login(String, String, String) method, if the given credentials are not correct.
    PermissionDeniedException
    Thrown when checked permission is denied.
